item.title: My 7-Day HELOC Prep Checklist
item.description: The biggest mistake I made during my first HELOC attempt was assuming I could wing it. The lender asked for CLTV math, I fumbled. They wanted proof of reserves, I rummaged through email. This time around, I built a seven-day prep checklist that aligned calculators, credit steps, and lender communication. By the end of the week I had a shareable packet, a calmer household, and a green light from underwriting. Here’s the day-by-day breakdown.

item.title: Our 30-Minute Lender Huddle Playbook
item.description:
Loan officers are busy. If you wander through a HELOC update call, they tune out. I learned that after a rambling conversation last spring where I forgot half the numbers. This time we built a 30-minute “lender huddle” playbook. Every agenda item referenced Cash-OutRefinance.com comparisons, MiddleCreditScore.com updates, and BrowseLenders.com overlays. The calls became efficient, respectful, and—dare I say—fun. Here’s the template we used.
